summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4614 for the improvement of Ward Street, from Yale Avenue North to Fairview Avenue North by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53677, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
